title: (c), (f), (h) and (j) of section 5 of the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 (No. 16
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 

(Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road traffic road act 2023 (commencement) (no 2) order 2025

title: (c), (f), (h) and (j) of section 5 of the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 (No. 16
heading: 2. The 19th day of May 2025 is appointed as the day on which paragraphs
text_raw:
2. The 19th day of May 2025 is appointed as the day on which paragraphs 
(c), (f), (h) and (j) of section 5 of the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 (No. 16 
of 2023) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

13 May, 2025. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 
Minister for Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 16th May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [132] 3

title: (c), (f), (h) and (j) of section 5 of the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 (No. 16
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order commences paragraphs (c), (f), (h) and (j) of section 5 of the Road 
Traffic and Roads Act 2023 (No. 16 of 2023).
